column4: you do smbpasswd -L -a username and then smbpasswd -L -e username
it still didn't work, though I know that the user is enabled now
did you try sudo smbpasswd -L -a username and sudo smbpasswd -L -e username
at the bottom where it says public change the force user and force group to your unix login name
also try changing the create mask to 0644 and the directory mask 0755 in [public]
thanks, got it working
what got it to work?
the force user and force group settings
using konquerer i can see it easily under smb://workgroupname

you using wins support?
wins support?

if your linux box has a static ip you can add a line to your smb.conof if it isnt already there that says wins support = yes and then on your windows box configure it to use wins in tcpi/ip protocal under advanced
